SELECT T1.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY F.REG_DT DESC) AS RNUM, F.ID, F.DAILY_CODE, F.USAGE, C.MST_CT_NM, C.DTL_CT_NM, F.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(F.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, TO_CHAR(F.MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOD_DT, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM FINANCE F, CATEGORY C
AND (F.REG_DT BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}) AND ID=#{id} )T1
WHERE T1.RNUM BETWEEN (#{page_size}*(#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size}*(#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size})

SELECT T1.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY F.REG_DT DESC) AS RNUM, F.ID, F.DAILY_CODE, F.USAGE, C.MST_CT_NM, C.DTL_CT_NM, F.CONTENT, F.REG_DT, F.MOD_DT, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM FINANCE F, CATEGORY C WHERE F.MST_CT_ID = C.MST_CT_ID AND F.DTL_CT_ID = C.DTL_CT_ID AND (F.REG_DT BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}) AND ID=#{id} )T1
